cast.overview: An aged Charlie Chaplin narrates his life to his autobiography's editor, including his rise to wealth and comedic fame from poverty, his turbulent personal life and his run-ins with the FBI.
cast.title: Chaplin

cast.overview: Two out-of-work actors -- the anxious, luckless Marwood and his acerbic, alcoholic friend, Withnail -- spend their days drifting between their squalid flat, the unemployment office and the pub. When they take a holiday "by mistake" at the country house of Withnail's flamboyantly gay uncle, Monty, they encounter the unpleasant side of the English countryside: tedium, terrifying locals and torrential rain.
cast.title: Withnail & I

details.biography: Una Brandon-Jones was born on April 24, 1916 in St Albans, Hertfordshire, England, UK. She was an actress, known for Withnail and I (1987), Chaplin (1992) and All Creatures Great & Small (1978). She was married to John Gold. She died on December 22, 2010 in London, England, UK.
details.name: Una Brandon-Jones
